section.title: Distribution file naming convention
section.para: The names given to download files indicates what the product is, what platform it runs on, its version. Through the version you can also determine how stable the system should be. The file name format is as follows:
The parts of the name are:

item2.label: product
item2.para: At the moment we only build the core framework, which is nakedobjects. In the future will provide other products.

item2.label: build
item2.para: The build number is a date/time stamp showing when the distribution was built.

item2.label: platform
item2.para: We target two platforms with the core framework; Java and .NET (idicated as java and dotnet). Other components might support either or both. Also available is source distribution, which is much smaller and must be built before it can be used.

item2.label: file-type
item2.para: The file type is always zip.
